name: Idle Pac-Man [Beta]
description:
Idle Pac-Man is a simple idle/clicker game made in two weeks for the Game Off Game Jam. I didn't get nearly as much done as I wanted to, but I learnt a lot making this and had fun doing so!

The game was mostly balanced around the first ten levels or so, but I would love to come back to this to add more content and scale things better. There's also no saving atm, sorry!
